climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Lighten your load with this light weight tablet and entertain your down time with its long lasting battery
USB OTG for Data Transfer and Charging: Simultaneously transfer data and charge the tablet with the USB OTG (on-the-go) support feature
Binge-worthy Battery; Browse, watch Or shop for up to ten hours on a full charge; Keyboard Compatible
Big sound for big entertainment; The perfect complement to a wide, immersive picture, Dolby Atoms Surround sound fills the room with cinematic clarity
body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.The product is multiple voltage compatible that voltage arrange is100-240V

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am happy with the Samsung Galaxy Tab A (2019).
reviews.reviewText: For a refurbished Tablet I am impressed, and the price tag is nice. The package is diffiently not the Samsung original as well as the charger adapter is generic. Does NOT come with instructions or any information about the Tablet. The Tablet arrived in decent condition, I saw no scratches or damage on the device.Once I power up the Tablet and setup, first thing I notice was the bright sharp screen. I was replacing my old Tablet was the Samsung Tab A (2016). When I upgraded to the Tab A (2019), it was simplicity to set up. I was smart enough to know not to expect a manual to come with the refurbished device. So I went on-line to a Samsung website and download the manual for free. I like finding all those little tricks and short cuts that you normal don't know about. Especially the double tap the blank screen to open the device. I am a fan of SCREEN SHOT. The idea of pressing the ON and Volume button at the same time is cumbersome and just down right annoying. Now, I wave my palm across the screen and the SCREEN SHOT automatically done. The battery life is nothing to write home about. I can squeeze about 9 to 10 hours out of the Tablet with the Power Saving Mode on. The quick charge was impressive for a Tablet. I used the device for Business Travel and it fit my working needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This tablet looked like brand new. I wasn't sure what it would look like being it was refurbished., but I was pleasantly surprised. The screen is bright and clear of any defects.. The battery life is slightly less than brand new but no worse than my old tablet was. So far I'm very pleased with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wrong charger=uselessness, VERY SLOW
reviews.reviewText: I just got this tablet today for our son to use. I will update on the value and use later. However presently it seems great screen quality and the set up was fast and easy. The picture is clear and I don’t notice any cosmetic flaws. They sent the wrong charger. The one They sent (pictured) Is not only the wrong shape it is also the wrong size and too small for the charger port. This is very dissatisfying as I was really hoping to set it up tonight and become familiar with it. I will now have to find time to go and by a charger for it that fits. It did come with some battery life 15% so I was able to turn it on and do the basic start up. I will have to wait till I get a charger to download apps and familiarize myself with it.***Update*** this tablet was great at first after I bought a correct charger for it. However after about 6months use the tablet started getting slower. I continued to make sure all updates were done and made sure not too many apps were on the device. It has gotten even more slow over the past month and February will be 1 year of having it. We don’t even use it daily maybe 1-2 times a week. It’s so slow now it’s just frustrating to try to use. Looks like I will be having to find another one to replace it. Such a disappointment.
